title: Duellist's Prerogative
content: Duellist's Prerogative Legendary 5~15 Damage 1d8+3Piercing+ 1d4 Necrotic Weapon Enchantment +3 Main Hand OnlyElegant Duellist: While your off-hand is empty, you score a Critical Hit when rolling a 19. Moreover, you gain an additional reaction per turn. Withering Cut: On a hit with a melee weapon, use a reaction to deal additional Necrotic damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
